explanation:
code_hardening: Added guards for empty text, invalid dimensions, and non-positive step size; stored the original TextPaint text size and ensured trimming logic cannot underflow indices when applying ellipsis.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed all bisection-related variables and watchdog logic; relied on existing getTextHeight and TextPaint getters/setters available in the class; adjusted StaticLayout usage to work directly with the existing TextPaint.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced the bisection search with a linear decrement loop using a fixed pixel step; explicitly capped the starting size by mMaxTextSize when set; removed binary-search bounds logic; changed ellipsis handling to build and measure layouts using the existing TextPaint at the target size; applied the final size directly via TextPaint.setTextSize while still resetting line spacing and notifying listeners.
refactoring: Simplified sizing variables to startSize, targetTextSize, and step; removed lower/upper bounds and other bisection helpers; method visibility set to private per intent.
misc: Updated inline comments to describe the linear sizing approach and cleaned up formatting after removing binary-search logic; no new custom API calls were introduced.
